Text:
God BLESS you, murray_buckman!

"Murray!... Murray the DOG!"

For those that care, these episodes are tagged with the uploaders signature, "[BUCK]". The quality is VHSRip at best but, unfortunately, there are no other uploads out there...at least that I have found.
Seasons 1-7 have meen compiled into a single torrent: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6391610/Mad_About_You_Complete_Seasons_1-7
